summary: A young girl, with an amazing ability to communicate with insects, is transferred to an exclusive Swiss boarding school, where her unusual capability might help solve a string of murders.
cast: Jennifer Connelly|Daria Nicolodi|Fiore Argento|Federica Mastroianni|Fiorenza Tessari|Dalila Di Lazzaro|Patrick Bauchau|Donald Pleasence|Alberto Cracco|Kaspar Capparoni|Mario Donatone|Antonio Maimone|Davide Marotta|Fulvio Mingozzi|Francesca Ottaviani|Michele Soavi|Franco Trevisi|Fausta Avelli|Franca Berdini|Marta Biuso|Marisa Simonetti|Geraldine Thomas|Tanga|Dario Argento|Sophie Bourchier|Paola Gropper|Ninke Hielkema|Mitzy Orsini
title: Phenomena
